description:
#FormerNetworkExec #CallMeChato #disney 
Sheridan College was the most famous source of traditional and 3D animators. Following on  @FilmThreat 's Disney exposé, the D-File, showing what a shambles Disney had become, a student at Sheridan reached out to me to explain the same thing has happened to this once great school.

Thanks for watching my channel. Please subscribe, SHARE and touch yourselves.

Call Me Chato T-shirt
https://my-store-6121db.creator-spring.com/listing/ppc-cartoon-t-colour

https://twitter.com/PaulChato
http://www.paulchato.com
title: Has DEI killed Canada's finest animation school?
